reviews.review:
"My #1 most favourite game ever. It's an amazing experience with (some) enjoyable replayability and very nice puzzles. The story is amazing and so is overall gameplay. Even though some things from the trailers didn't make it to the game, it's still an unique experience tons of times better than Portal 1. In short, if you don't have this game yet, BUY IT. You WON'T regret it, seriously, it's damn worth the money. A perfect 10." - My April 23rd, 2011 recommendation.

Well, my opinion hasn't changed one bit: this is one of the greatest single player puzzle experiences you can have on the PC. But why did I decide to remake the review?
WELL BECAUSE NOW IT HAS A "#$)%/" AWESOME LEVEL EDITOR WHICH IS THE BEST THING VALVE HAS DONE TO ANY OF THEIR GAMES SINCE THE GOLD RUSH UPDATE FOR TF2 HOLY !)#/. (my favourite mode in TF2 is Payload, yes.)

Okay, sorry about that. I understand how fanboyish I sounded there. But come on, an already great game getting an EASY TO LEARN AND USE editor? You seriously can't get any better than this! Buy it now, you will NOT regret it!
My game of the year! This game makes you think and solve inventive puzzles. Portal 2 has some of the best voice acting I have ever heard.

Nada que decir ! Un Excelente Juego , no mejor dicho "JUEGAZO" Su jugabilidad es increible y mas encima ahora te da la opcion de hacer mapas y subirlos a la workshop ! Que es mucho mejor jajaj ! Saludos y comprenselo vale totalmente la pena :)

Portal 2 der nachfolger des Erfolgshits Portal. Ein Spiel bei dem es nicht darauf ankommt wieviel Gegner man getötet hat (gibt nämliche keine), man muss nämlich Rätsel lösen indem man Portale benutzt. Perfektes Spiel für Ab und Zu. Aber auch länger am Stück macht es Spaß. Man muss nämlich sein Hirn anstrengen um an die Lösung zukommen. Das ganze wird durch eine Coop Campagne und ein eigenen Editor getop.

Absolute Kaufempfehlung!
Great Game, definitely worth getting for the Story and Co Op.

It's simply a great first person puzzle game. Into posterity It has set the bar for the genre and one could argue that it hasn't yet been surpassed.  If you've never played a first person 3d puzzle game, start here.

Another game that I was late to try.  Although critically acclaimed, I often find puzzle games frustrating - and Portal 2 is no exception.  I would reccomend you play it, but my attention span only lasts until I get stuck on a puzzle.
good

For someone that doesn't enjoy singleplayer games that much, THIS GAME WAS AWESOME. Everything was just perfect. The story was awesome. Best singleplayer game I've ever played hands down. Co-op is pretty fun too, but I've haven't played too much of it yet. JACK IS TOO LAZY.

A fast paced, yet challenging puzzle solving procedure with unique gameplay mechanics wrapped up in an engaging storyline. Flawless presentation, specially the voice acting. Runs smoothly on almost every system. Cross platform coop and steam workshop skyrocket replayability.

¿el mejor juego del año?

la respuesta es: SI

no dejes que se te valla aprovecha la oferta de fin de semana o te lo van a ganar
I don't hate you!
BETTER THEN "PORTAL"
Musthave!
One of the best games of 2011.  Also my favorite videogame story of 2011.  I know you guys will enjoy it!
maybe the best game of all time, true 10/10

Super Ammazing loved it so much beat it in 6 hours  though :(
Still Great game for what I paid.
also its graphically amazing.
wheatly,all that needs to be said
Great game. The coop was a fun addition.

My first love <3

Absolutely amazing story that will blow you away, and tons of hilarious banter. 
Fun, and mentally engaging.
It has portals, robots, cubes, and now even edgeless cubes! You must play.
One of the best games ever....!!!!!!!

Amazing game, very immersive and unique.
Top Spiel, bei dem man seinen Kopf ein wenig anstrengen muss.
The best game of 2011 year!!!

After the editor was released, this game became perfect. People are churning out more and more challenging maps so you can't blame this game doesn't have enough content. Single players is good as always but it obviously doesn't have any replay value. Same thing with co-op mode, however, it's one of the best co-ops ever made.
寝室玩这游戏的人都头里昏,最后得出结论————这是个好游戏.

Selon dieu (moi), ce jeu est le meilleur de tout les temps, non seulement pour l'originalité des dialogues (j'etais lol à donf tt le long!!!) mais aussi pour le gameplay, un peu casse tete par moment, mais c'est tellement bon en coop!!!
Great game

Freakishly Good Game geared for jumping through portals just got a healthy dose of replay with the new Build your own adventure patch and for the price their askin'...

... What you still reading this for buy the game man!
Gra jedna z lepszych. Wciągające łamigłówki, które można prosto i efektywnie rozwiązać. Godna polecenia.
Hell yea! grandioso.
finished the solo player mode today... AWESOME. Also co-op highly recommended!
Historia divertidísima y entretenida. Puzzles para pasar horas enganchado y un multijugador increíble
It turns my brain into jam.
Basicamente um dos jogos mais bem feitos da Valve, esse com certeza é um jogo bom. Pode comprar que não irá se arrepender, o modo cooperativo também é muito divertido. Saudade já!
Excellent Singleplayer, excellent Co-Op, Throw in a map maker and you have LittleBigAlternateEarth; UNLIMITED GAMEPLAY what more could you ask for?

Run around, solve puzzle, jump around, make holes and run around more. I can GUARANTEE this game will increase your IQ and the score of you SAT tests.
awesome, just perfect. you should aquire this must have!
Saying it's a great wonderful big game isn't enough, also it's pretty damn cheap. And it has co-op suicide robots!
2nd best hat simulator, hands down.

There can be only one reason you do not already own this game.  You actively hate all of the following: fun, great writing, great characters, thinking, pleasure, not being bored.  That, or you haven't played the first Portal.  Do that first.
10 из 10. Гениальная игра.
Absolutely fantastic and creative game. MUST HAVE! Especially at sale prices!
절대 후회하지 않음! ㅋ
awesome game
Its a Co-Op Portal game! Awsome!
Stephen Merchant is funny as hell as the robot. I love this game, wish it were longer though.
Awesome puzzle-game!

Come si può migliorare una formula di gioco già perfetta in sè? Portal 2 è un chiaro esempio di come sia possibile migliorare la perfezione. Un ottimo puzzle che metterà a dura prova le vostre meningi più di quanto possiate immaginare. Aggiungete poi non una, ma ben DUE campagne da completare (la storia in single-player, e la parte cooperativa), assieme al recentissimo creatore di puzzle, e avrete una longevità pressocchè infinita.
Genial. Soy un fan de GLaDOS. Yo también quiero gasear científicos :P
One of the most amazing sequels I've ever played.
Funnest puzzle adventure game ever!

Amazing. You will not stop laughing. THE funniest game i'v ever played. The new gameplay elements are a great addition to the already awesome Portal universe. The game looks amazing, and plays smoothly. The new characters are all great and all hilarious. And now since Portal 2 is in the Steam Workshop right now, countless hours of fun await. I HIGHLY recommend this game.
The second best co-op game (behind L4D) around. Funny and thought engaging.
why would you not have this
Now with the Perpetual Testing initiative, the game is already better than best, with multiplayer gameplay and custom maps!
make maps that make me wet. my butt wet that is.
Lovely.
If you want to blow your mind, just try out a few of the community's aneurysm inducing chambers.  You'll love it.
Po wyjściu DLC pozwalającego w łatwy sposób tworzyć nowe mapy i dzielić się nimi z resztą społeczności, ja nie mam już żadnych "ale" i daję 10/10. Ta gra właśnie stała się nieśmiertelna...

今日からテストチェンバーが作れるように！
これは・・・やばいですね、ようやくここまで来たかって感じです
My favourite game of 2011. Now with the new and simple map editor a lot of new and fun maps have been created that keep you going.
Portal 2, auf jeden Fall das beste SP Game der letzen Jahre! Ein wirkliches Meisterwerk!

멋진게임!
There's a reason it's so popular.

Wow! This game is has one of the most compelling storylines that I have ever played. Each level will drag you in for a thrill ride and continue to amaze you even after beaten. Just buy it; it's great.
If you like Puzzle You must Have it :D Recommended
A mind-bending marvel
This game is just fun all around. CoOp with friends just adds more fun to portal and with FREE DLC and now to be able to make maps and share them with other, why dont you have this yet?

Fun and mind bending, this game will have you looking from the ceiling to the floor and wishing you could just put portals everywhere! i love how they implemented steam workshop into this and skyrim...havent tried out any of the puzzles ive subscribed to or made any but ill have to check it out...if you dont have this game,  get it! they have plenty of sales for it, like today they have it on sale for abt six dollars :)
Top 5 best games ever. Personally my #1 favorite ever.
The most accurate depiction of science protrayed in modern media.
Výborná hra, ještě k tomu s Co-Op a DLC Editor map takže prakticky nesmrtelná hra s vtipným a docela obstojným příběhem. :D

A esta altura Portal 2 ya es un juego de culto. No solo por su adictiva jugabilidad y los enormes y epicos mapas, sino tambien por una historia completa, que cierra y llena de ironias de la mano de GladOs. El modo cooperativo es sin duda lo mejor de esta version y se agradece que los proximos DLC sean totalmente gratuitos para los que compraron este galardonado juego.

Jugabilidad: 92 Chuletas
Graficos: 85 Chuletas
Sonido: 92 Chuletas
Coop: 95 Chuletas

Total: 91/100 Chuleta's Points :v

The story.. the co-op, both tremendous, amazing! Totally worth the money
Brillante, estimulante, gratificante....Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado en mi vida de Gamer. Valve, tú sí que sabes hacer bien las cosas, tienes mi voto de confianza.
One of the best games of the world!!!
